[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA fuzzing run with AddressSanitizer enabled has uncovered a stack-based buffer [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow in the Mongoose codebase. During formatting operations in [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/printf.c` and `src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone-byte write overflows a local stack buffer. The overflow is detected when the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzer invokes `mg_http_parse` via the test harness, ultimately triggering `mg_log`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand the vulnerable formatting logic.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue type: stack-buffer-overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write beyond a stack-allocated buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Trigger: A specially crafted input fed through the fuzzing harness [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m into `mg_http_parse` causes `mg_log` to perform [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatted output that overruns a local buffer.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzer output highlights:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow occurs in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` called by [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static` and `scpy`.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The vulnerable frame is in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:247[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which allocates two [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocal buffers:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – `tmp` at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – `tmp371` at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The write at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m overruns the `tmp371` buffer by one byte.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Call stack:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → `scpy` → `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `mg_vsnprintf` [0m[35m/[0m[39m `mg_snprintf`  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. `mg_dtoa` [0m[35m/[0m[39m `mg_vxprintf`  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. `mg_log` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/log.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m. `mg_http_parse` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/http.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/test/fuzz.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mImportant observations and artifacts:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer reports the overflow in the stack redzone around the local [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The error is reproducible under libFuzzer with entropic power scheduling.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The stack frame in `mg_vxprintf` holds formatting buffers that are overrun by [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatted data.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for further investigation:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mespecially the implementation of `mg_vxprintf`, `scpy`,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand buffer sizing for formatted output[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `src/mongoose/src/printf.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe private I/O buffer routines in [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` and related functions[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any code paths in `mg_log` and `mg_http_parse` that invoke formatted output.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Interaction between `mg_snprintf`, `mg_vsnprintf`, and double-to-string routines [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that feed data into these buffers.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzz harness itself [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m simply supplies raw input to the HTTP [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparser and is not the root cause; the vulnerability resides in the formatting logic[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the core library.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m292[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m' '[0m[39m && !minus && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m293[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m294[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m"0x"[0m[39m, xl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m296[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m300[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'm'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'M'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m342[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mva_start[0m[1;39m([0m[39map, fmt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:  n = [0m[1;35mmg_vsnprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, len, fmt, &ap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mva_end[0m[1;39m([0m[39map[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:229[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m234[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m229[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *ptr, char *buf,[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m230[0m[39m:                          size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m231[0m[39m:  size_t i = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m232[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi < len && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m != [0m[32m'\0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m233[0m[39m:  return i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m234[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Identify and correct the buffer‐size mismatch in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting branch[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/fmt.c` around lines [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m323[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Currently, the code [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdeclares:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   but immediately calls:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This passes a buffer length of [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m into `mg_dtoa` while only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes are actually[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated on the stack, allowing up to two bytes of overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding the null [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mterminator[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. To fix, increase the stack buffer to match [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor exceed[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m the maximum size passed [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto `mg_dtoa`, and use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of a hardcoded constant. For example:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Change `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor slightly larger, e.g. [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m, to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallow future growth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Replace the literal `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` in the `mg_dtoa` call with `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This ensures `mg_dtoa` can never write past the end of `tmp`.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Add an explicit null‐termination and bounds check after both calls to `mg_dtoa` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand `mg_lld` in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – After `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`, do:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Similarly, after `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`, do the same [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbound‐and‐terminate.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This guards against any implementation detail of `mg_dtoa` or `mg_lld` that [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmight omit a terminator in corner cases.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. No other parts of the formatting code need changes:  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – The `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch already uses `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and passes `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto `mg_dtoa`.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – The `scpy` helper and the output buffer logic in `src/printf.c` remain [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muntouched, preserving existing functionality and fuzzing harness compatibility.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Verify the fix by rebuilding with AddressSanitizer and rerunning the existing [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibFuzzer test harness. The stack‐buffer‐overflow in the `%e` branch should no [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlonger occur, and all previous tests [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding corner cases for `%e` formatting[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould continue to pass unchanged.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mJustification:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Aligning the actual array size with the size passed to `mg_dtoa` eliminates the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moff‐by‐two overflow.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` rather than a magic constant improves maintainability and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevents future mismatches.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Explicitly null‐terminating the buffer ensures `scpy` will never read past the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mend, even if `mg_dtoa`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`mg_lld` behave unexpectedly.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No harness or utility code is modified, preserving the fuzzer entry points and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting tests.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Stack usage increases by only a few bytes, with no observable performance impact.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/28/25 13:56:35][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=781249;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=774433;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         vm.mmap_rnd_bits = [1;36m28[0m                                                                [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m -[33mrss_limit_mb[0m=[1;36m2560[0m -[33mtimeout[0m=[1;36m25[0m -[33mruns[0m=[1;36m100[0m [35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m -[33mtimeout_exitcode[0m=[1;36m0[0m [1m<[0m[39m [0m  [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Running with entropic power schedule [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0xFF[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                              [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c`. The overflow occurred in a small fixed‐size stack buffer when [0m         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch attempt increased one of the format‐handling buffers from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m bytes and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madded bounds checks and a null terminator for that buffer. After rebuilding and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrerunning the same fuzz input, AddressSanitizer reported an identical overflow, now[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpinpointing the second small buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`, still [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m within the same [0m      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzzing with libFuzzer and AddressSanitizer flags produced a crash in function[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, invoked via `scpy` and ultimately in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdefined[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The sanitizer report identified a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte write just beyond the end of a stack [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer, traced to offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the `mg_vxprintf` stack frame.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Examination of `mg_vxprintf` showed two local arrays in that frame:  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp` at bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp371` at bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow was writing at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, just past the end of `tmp371`.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` handling branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m in [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the developer changed  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     to  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     and updated calls to `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` to use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhard‐coded limit, with post‐call clamps:  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This patch only modified the first local buffer named `tmp`. The second [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer, declared later in the function, remained `char tmp371[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Result after patch  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuilding and rerunning with the same fuzz input still triggers an [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer overflow in the same code path.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The report again points to a write at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the `mg_vxprintf` frame, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis time clearly overflowing the unmodified `tmp371` buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No new code paths or errors appeared; the overflow simply shifted to the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill-too-small buffer.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for further investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Review all fixed-size, stack‐allocated buffers in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and other formatting functions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Ensure buffer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msizes and length checks cover worst-case output lengths.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Audit the generic `scpy` logic and underlying [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` pipelines to verify they respect [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecified lengths.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Examine other format specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%f`, `%g`, integer formatting, [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwidth/precision branches[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for similar small-buffer usage.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Consider replacing multiple small, ad-hoc buffers with a single dynamic or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msufficiently large scratch buffer to avoid repeated overflows.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m330[0m[39m:        n++;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m331[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m336[0m[39m:      i++;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
