[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m338[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, n++, i++;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m339[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m340[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m341[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m342[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:138[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m205[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *dst, size_t dstlen, double d, int width, bool tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[39m:  char buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m140[0m[39m:  int i, s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, e = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  double t, mul, saved;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md == [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"0"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m143[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, d > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"inf"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"-inf"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"nan"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m d = -d, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m147[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Round[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m148[0m[39m:  saved = d;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:    mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m:    mul = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m154[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m155[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m156[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul * [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m; i < width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m159[0m[39m:  d += t;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m160[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Calculate exponent, and [0m[32m'mul'[0m[39m for scientific representation[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m162[0m[39m:  mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m163[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e++;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e--;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m165[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %g %d %g %g\n"[0m[39m, saved, e, t, mul[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m167[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e >= width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m168[0m[39m:    n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, saved [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, width, tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %.*g %d [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, d [0m[35m/[0m[39m t, e, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, e, [0m[32m'+'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e <= -width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m173[0m[39m:    n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, saved [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, width, tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %.*g %d [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, e, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, -e, [0m[32m'-'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m177[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m178[0m[39m:    int targ_width = width;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m179[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul; t >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && s + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m180[0m[39m:      int ch = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39md [0m[35m/[0m[39m t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m181[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m || ch > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mch + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m182[0m[39m:      d -= ch * t;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m183[0m[39m:      t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m184[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m185[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%g[0m[32m][0m[32m -> %g %g [0m[32m([0m[32m%d[0m[32m)[0m[32m [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, saved, d, t, n, s + n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m186[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m187[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mt >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && n + s < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m, t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m188[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn + s++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'.'[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m189[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" 1--> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%g[0m[32m][0m[32m -> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, saved, s + n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m190[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!tz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m targ_width = width + n;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m191[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m; s + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m && n < targ_width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m192[0m[39m:      int ch = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39md [0m[35m/[0m[39m t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m193[0m[39m:      buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mch + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m194[0m[39m:      d -= ch * t;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m195[0m[39m:      t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m196[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m197[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m198[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing zeroes[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'.'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing dot[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m201[0m[39m:  n += s;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m202[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn >= [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m203[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m204[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m205[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:207[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m227[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:  const char *letters = [0m[32m"0123456789abcdef"[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview and Root Cause  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The overflow stems from the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting path in `mg_vxprintf` [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, where a tiny stack buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is used to stage both the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia `mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and then the exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  The code originally[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpassed a dst‐length of [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m to `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlarger than [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and had no length checks, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mleading to out-of-bounds writes.  A patch increased the buffer to [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m and added [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mclamps, but the applied diff never actually landed [0m[1;39m([0m[39madditional ASan reports still [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshow [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  Regardless, even [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m bytes is unsafe in corner cases [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mmantissa digits + decimal point + trailing null + exponent in same buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strategy for a Correct Fix  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. **Enlarge the Scratch Buffer**  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      Replace `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` with a buffer as large as the generic formatting buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  This matches the size used in the `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branch and guarantees [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mample room for mantissa, decimal point, and exponent staging.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. **Use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for Bounds**  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      Pass `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39minstead of a hard‐coded literal[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m so that [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa` is never told to write more than the actual buffer.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. **Clamp and Null‐Terminate**  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      After both the `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` calls, clamp the returned length `k` to[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` and write `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m`.  This ensures no writes cross the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer boundary and that each output string is properly terminated if other code [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccidentally treats it as C-string.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. **Preserve Fuzzing/Harness Logic**  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      All changes are local to the formatting function in `src/fmt.c`.  We do not [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtouch the fuzzer harness, `scpy`, or any tests.  The surrounding `scpy` calls still[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39monly copy `k` bytes, so no existing logic is broken.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Patch Steps  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   In `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReplace the block:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   with:[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Stage mantissa and exponent in a sufficiently large scratch buffer *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Mantissa via mg_dtoa, clamp and null-terminate *[0m[35m/[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Print the [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m or [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m specifier *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n++;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Exponent via mg_lld, clamp and null-terminate *[0m[35m/[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Buffer Size**: [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes matches other branches and is known safe for all [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdouble/scientific outputs.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Bounds**: `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` both write into `tmp`, but are now [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconstrained not to exceed its capacity.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Functionality**: Output order [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mantissa` → specifier → exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muntouched; width/precision and padding logic around it is preserved.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Eliminates Overflows**: No dst-length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m can exceed the real [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marray size, and the clamp+null steps prevent writes past `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m39[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Minimal Impact**: Other formatting branches remain unchanged; none of the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness code or `scpy` logic is modified.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Consistency**: Reuses the same buffer size as the `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` path, avoiding [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mad‐hoc small buffers.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Performance**: A [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte stack buffer is negligible cost and already in use [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39melsewhere; no heap allocation or dynamic buffers are introduced.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Side Effects and Mitigation  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Stack Usage**: +[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes on the stack for this frame; acceptable given [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting use of [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffers.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Null-Termination**: We introduce explicit nulls that harmlessly overwrite [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspace already reserved.  No existing callers depend on missing nulls.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Precision Semantics**: We keep the hard-coded `[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` digits of precision for [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%e`, matching behavior before.  If someday full `printf` semantics for `.*` [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprecision are desired, that would be a separate enhancement.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Validation  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild with AddressSanitizer and libFuzzer; the original fuzz testcase no [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlonger triggers a stack-buffer-overflow in `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing unit tests and log parsing to ensure no regressions.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Manual spot-checks of `%e` formatting for large and small exponents.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/28/25 13:58:39][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=916307;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=195315;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Patching[1m)[0m Started[33m...[0m                            ]8;id=943448;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=105091;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#9\[2m9[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m0x7f71fc359d80[0m[39m: f3 f3 f3 f3 [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mShadow byte legend [0m[1;39m([0m[39mone shadow byte represents [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m application bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpr9r9j4kl[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer stack-buffer-overflow was triggered in the Mongoose HTTP [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibrary’s formatting code while fuzzing the `mg_http_parse` path. The overflow [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs in `mg_vxprintf` when formatting `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` floating-point values: a local [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscratch buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes long but is written past its end. A patch[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempt enlarged a nearby buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and added length checks[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand null-termination for both mantissa and exponent strings. After applying the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch, the same stack-buffer-overflow still occurs at the same location [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating that the fix did not address the actual vulnerable buffer.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzing the HTTP request parser [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_http_parse`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m led to a crash under [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow is reported in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` called by `scpy`, from within [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Stack frame for `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat fmt.[0m[1;92mc:247[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m allocates two local buffers:  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `tmp` at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `tmp371` at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The write of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m writes just past the end of the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`, into the redzone.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The backtrace shows the path: `mg_vxprintf` → `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m → `mg_log` → [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_http_parse` → fuzzer entry.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mImportant Observations  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow target is `tmp371`, not `tmp`.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow happens in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Each formatted output [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantissa and exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is staged into a fixed-size buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthen copied via `scpy`.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- There is no bounds checking or dynamic sizing for the exponent string.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch at fmt.c lines ~[0m[1;36m315[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m330[0m[39m:  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Increased `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Changed `mg_dtoa` call to pass the new buffer size and added clamping + [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnull-termination.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Inserted an explicit call to `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for the exponent marker.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Added clamping and null-termination after `mg_lld` for the exponent.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The patch lines roughly:  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```diff[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  -        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[33m...[0m[39m  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  -        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m; tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  -        k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +        k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m; tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After rebuilding and running the fuzzer again, AddressSanitizer reports the same [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow remains in the second local buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logs, backtrace, and shadow bytes pattern are identical in structure, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirming that the vulnerable buffer was not modified by the patch.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFurther Investigation  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Inspect the `mg_vxprintf` function in fmt.c, especially around line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m where [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371` is declared and used.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Identify all local buffers in `mg_vxprintf` and any unbounded writes to them [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., `scpy` calls[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Review the formatting paths for other specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%f`, `%g`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that may use [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same buffers.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Trace how `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` produce output lengths and whether those lengths[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcan exceed buffer capacities.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Examine `scpy`’s usage pattern and ensure that any staged buffers are sized or [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecked appropriately before copying.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
