[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, -e, [0m[32m'-'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m177[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m178[0m[39m:    int targ_width = width;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m179[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul; t >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && s + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m180[0m[39m:      int ch = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39md [0m[35m/[0m[39m t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m181[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m || ch > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mch + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m182[0m[39m:      d -= ch * t;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m183[0m[39m:      t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m184[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m185[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%g[0m[32m][0m[32m -> %g %g [0m[32m([0m[32m%d[0m[32m)[0m[32m [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, saved, d, t, n, s + n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m186[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m187[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mt >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && n + s < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m, t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m188[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn + s++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'.'[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m189[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" 1--> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%g[0m[32m][0m[32m -> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, saved, s + n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m190[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!tz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m targ_width = width + n;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m191[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m; s + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m && n < targ_width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m192[0m[39m:      int ch = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39md [0m[35m/[0m[39m t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m193[0m[39m:      buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mch + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m194[0m[39m:      d -= ch * t;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m195[0m[39m:      t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m196[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m197[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m198[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing zeroes[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'.'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing dot[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m201[0m[39m:  n += s;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m202[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn >= [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m203[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m204[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m205[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:207[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m227[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:  const char *letters = [0m[32m"0123456789abcdef"[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Identify and enlarge the correct temporary [0m[1;35mbuffer[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in mg_vxprintf responsible [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor staging both mantissa and exponent. In the current code there are two distinct [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` declarations in that function: one for the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m“tmp371” buffer observed by ASan[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and potentially another elsewhere. The previous [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch only grew one of these buffers; the true overflow target remains the small [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer at offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Replace both instances of `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` in mg_vxprintf with a larger, uniform [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscratch buffer, for example:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch, declare `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor even `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m64[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat the top of that block.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • If there is another `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` in the same function [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g. for `%g` [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, enlarge it identically or merge both into one `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m64[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` declared [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat function start.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` case, split staging of mantissa and exponent into clearly [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounded steps:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a. Mantissa:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Call `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Clamp: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m; tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;`[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Copy: `n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b. Exponent marker: `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;`[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     c. Exponent:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Call `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Clamp: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m; tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;`[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Copy: `n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Do not alter `scpy`, `mg_dtoa`, or `mg_lld` signatures. All safety enforcement [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis local to mg_vxprintf by:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Ensuring the staging buffer is sufficiently large.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Passing the real buffer size to mg_dtoa.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Clamping mg_lld’s output length before copying.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Verify that after these changes, the stack-frame layout for mg_vxprintf no [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlonger contains any [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte tmp buffer for the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` path; ASan should report no[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer overflows at that site.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhy this works:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- By growing the staging buffer to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor more[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, both mantissa and exponent [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstrings—whose worst‐case lengths [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfloating digits + sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are well below that—will [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malways fit.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Passing `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to mg_dtoa prevents it from ever writing beyond the local [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Clamping and null-terminating after mg_lld bounds its writes to the known buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Existing functionality and formatting semantics are preserved: only the temporary[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstorage and length checks change.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPotential side effects and mitigation:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Stack usage in mg_vxprintf increases by ~[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes. This is negligible given [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtypical stack sizes.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No changes are made to other code paths, so formatting for `%f`, `%g`, integers, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39metc., remain untouched.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All fuzzing harnesses and test suites should pass unchanged, since behavior and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput formatting are identical for valid inputs.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy applying these changes to the initial codebase [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand ensuring that any other [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` in the function is similarly resized[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the AddressSanitizer [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch will be fully resolved. [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-detected stack-buffer-overflow in the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, triggered during floating-point formatting[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m under fuzz testing. A patch was attempted by increasing the size of a [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocal scratch buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, adding bounds checks and explicit [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnull-termination after calls to `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld`. After applying the patch, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same buffer-overflow error recurs at the same stack frame and offset, [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating the overflow is still occurring despite the larger buffer and clamping [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A fuzzing run on the Mongoose HTTP server code [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`src/`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m produced an [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer report:  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - The overflow occurs in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` when writing into a stack [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - The backtrace shows the call originates from `scpy` → [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m` → `mg_vxprintf` → `mg_log` → `mg_http_parse` → the fuzz[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - ASan pinpoints the overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the `mg_vxprintf` frame, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflowing the local variable `[0m[32m'tmp371'[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m of `src/fmt.c`.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Two local buffers exist in that frame: one at bytes [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m72[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39manother at bytes [0m[1;36m112[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m120[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which is too small for certain formatted [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutputs.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Important Observations  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The failure is a one-byte write beyond the end of a local array in the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting routine.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The offending formatting branch is the scientific notation handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m|| c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow still occurs after modifying buffer sizes in that branch, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msuggesting the root cause may involve other buffers or formatting paths in the same[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mframe.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Original code used `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` in the `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m` branch.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The patch:  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Replaced `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` with `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Changed calls to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Added clamps on the returned length `k` to ensure `k < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minserted `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Introduced clamping logic for the exponent before calling `mg_lld`.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Similarly applied buffer-size checks after `mg_lld`.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer for [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m executions, AddressSanitizer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreports the same one-byte stack overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Post-Patch Log Highlights  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The same sanitizer backtrace appears, pointing to the same code locations [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, `mg_putchar_iobuf_static`, `scpy`, [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ASan again indicates overflow in the same frame, implying the adjustments did [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot cover all cases or memory writes in that function.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_vxprintf` function’s stack frame at line [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m: examine all local [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `tmp371` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Determine how `tmp371` is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mused and why it overflows.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other formatting branches in `mg_vxprintf` that may allocate buffers of fixed,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minsufficient size.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The implementations of `mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`, `scpy`, and how they write to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtheir output buffers.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether the specialized inlining path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m introduces[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mextra buffers or bypasses the patched logic.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any interactions between mantissa/exponent formatting and padding logic [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`minus`, `w`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that could lead to unexpected writes.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:138[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m145[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *dst, size_t dstlen, double d, int width, bool tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[39m:  char buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m140[0m[39m:  int i, s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, e = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  double t, mul, saved;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md == [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"0"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m143[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, d > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"inf"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"-inf"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"nan"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m d = -d, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root‐Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m there are two local scratch buffers:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • A [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m‐byte `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` used by the integer/“%g”[0m[35m/[0m[39m“%f” branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m~[0m[1;36m275[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m313[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • An [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` used by the “%e”[0m[35m/[0m[39m“%E” branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines ~[0m[1;36m317[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m328[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte buffer is overrun because:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • mg_dtoa was called with [0m[33mdstlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, despite tmp being only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • mg_lld similarly writes more digits than the buffer can hold.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The attempted patch increased the small buffer to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes and added clamps, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut ASan still reports overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the `mg_vxprintf` frame, [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating that the original [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte buffer remains unmodified in practice [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlikely [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdue to diff mis‐application[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and/or the buffer is still too small for some [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorner‐case exponent or mantissa lengths.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strategy Overview[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Remove all undersized per‐branch scratch buffers in mg_vxprintf and replace [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthem with a single, sufficiently large buffer.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Ensure every call to mg_dtoa, mg_lld [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand any other low‐level digit‐writing [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhelper[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m uses the correct dstlen and is followed by explicit bounds‐check and [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnull‐termination.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Keep [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout,…[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calls identical—only change their source buffers.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   D. Avoid touching harness, tests, utility functions, or external libraries.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Steps[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Open src/fmt.c and locate the start of mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m245[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Immediately after the variable declarations [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`size_t [0m[33mi[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m,[0m[33mn[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m… [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, introduce a single large scratch buffer:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Global scratch area for numeric conversions[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        #define VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE [0m[1;36m128[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mVXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Remove both `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline ~[0m[1;36m275[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline ~[0m[1;36m318[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mentirely.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. In the integer/“%d/%u/%x/%g/%f” branch, replace uses of the old tmp with [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scratch`, pass `VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE` to mg_lld/mg_dtoa/mg_snprintf, then:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch, VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE, d, width, tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, scratch, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        And similarly for mg_lld or mg_snprintf calls.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. In the “%e”[0m[35m/[0m[39m“%E” branch, entirely remove the old [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte tmp and replace with [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical scratch usage:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        a. mantissa formatting:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch, VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE, mantissa, precision, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, scratch, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        b. output the exponent marker [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        c. exponent formatting:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m clamp exponent to reasonable range to avoid absurd widths[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           int64_t cap = VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m leave room for sign/null[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent >  cap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m exponent =  cap;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < -cap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m exponent = -cap;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlong long[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mexponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, scratch, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m. Remove any duplicate clamp logic or multiple tmp arrays—there must be only [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone scratch.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m. Keep the original parsing and scpy calls intact aside from the buffer pointer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand size changes.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m. Rebuild and rerun the fuzzer for at least [0m[1;36m1000[0m[39m iterations to validate that no[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack‐buffer‐overflow is reported in mg_vxprintf.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By consolidating to one large [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m128[0m[39m‐byte[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buffer, we eliminate all mismatches [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbetween buffer size and dstlen arguments.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - [0m[1;36m128[0m[39m bytes is ample for any “%e” output even with extreme exponents and [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muser‐supplied precision.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Bounds‐checking `k < buffer_size` and explicit `scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m` guarantees [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mno overflow.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This approach preserves all existing formatting logic, only changes staging [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack‐usage increase is minimal [0m[1;39m([0m[39m<[0m[1;36m128[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and acceptable.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No harness, test, or external code is modified; fuzzing entry and test [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcoverage remain identical.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This pattern [0m[1;39m([0m[39munique scratch buffer + dstlen clamp + null‐termination[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m matches[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhow mg_dtoa and mg_lld are intended to be used elsewhere in the codebase, ensuring [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconsistency.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side‐Effects & Mitigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Slightly larger stack frame for mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39man extra ~[0m[1;36m128[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Mitigate by[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchoosing the smallest safe buffer size—[0m[1;36m128[0m[39m is a reasonable upper bound.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If future specifiers require larger outputs, increase VXPRINTF_SCRATCH_SIZE [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccordingly.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No logical changes to format parsing or output ordering—behavior is unchanged.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Verification[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After patch, run existing unit tests in test/, and fuzz with AddressSanitizer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39menabled.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm absence of stack-buffer-overflow reports in mg_vxprintf across all [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnumeric specifiers.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Measure code coverage to ensure no regression in formatting branches.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          n++;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a stack-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer in [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, specifically when formatting floating-point values with `%e` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor `%E`. The overflow occurs in the stack buffer named `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen scpy writes beyond its boundary.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempt introduces a larger scratch buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m128[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtop of mg_vxprintf, replaces the local `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` case with the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshared scratch buffer, clamps the formatted length, and null-terminates the data. [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIt also applies clamping logic to the exponent and uses scratch for exponent [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, fuzzing still triggers the same stack-buffer-overflow at [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the mg_vxprintf frame. The sanitizer report again points to a write [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mjust beyond the end of the second small buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fuzz run of the Mongoose HTTP parser [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → mg_http_parse[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggers AddressSanitizer’s stack-buffer-overflow in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` called [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The sanitizer trace shows a one-byte write past the end of a stack object at [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the mg_vxprintf frame. Two objects are listed:  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • ‘tmp’ occupying bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • ‘tmp371’ occupying bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow happens in the code path handling the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` conversion while [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopying formatted data to the output buffer via `scpy`.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a new buffer `char scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m128[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` is declared before the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformat-processing loop.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m340[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The code reads the argument `double d`, computes `exponent` and `mantissa`.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • It calls `mg_dtoa` into `scratch` [0m[1;39m([0m[39minstead of a small `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, clamps `k` to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m`, null-terminates, and uses `scpy`.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Writes the conversion marker [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m via `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Applies clamping to the exponent magnitude so it fits `scratch`.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Calls `mg_lld` into `scratch` for the exponent, again clamps and [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnull-terminates before `scpy`.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The original fall‐through `%` handler remains unchanged.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mLog After Patch  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The same fuzz command reproduces the overflow.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer outputs an identical stack-buffer-overflow at [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private, scpy, and the specialized mg_vxprintf frame.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow still writes at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the stack frame, overflowing the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mobject at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, labelled ‘tmp371’, indicating that parts of the original small[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers remain in that frame.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFurther Investigation  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The mg_vxprintf function frame still contains the original local buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The new `scratch` buffer does not fully replace all uses of the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msmall temporaries.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Review all format‐specifier branches in mg_vxprintf to identify remaining [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msmall-stack objects or unbounded writes [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `%f`, `%g`, integer conversions, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwidth/precision handling[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Inspect the definitions of `scpy`, `mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`, and the static output [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer logic in printf.c to see how they compute lengths, handle null terminators, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand enforce buffer limits.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Examine stack layout and alignment in mg_vxprintf to confirm how many and which [0m  [2m                [0m
