[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m289[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, s ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v : [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m290[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m291[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j < xl && w > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m w--;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m292[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m' '[0m[39m && !minus && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m293[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m294[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m"0x"[0m[39m, xl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m295[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m296[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m297[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m298[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m' '[0m[39m && minus && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m299[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m300[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'm'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'M'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m301[0m[39m:        mg_pm_t f = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, mg_pm_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m302[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'm'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'"'[0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m303[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, ap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m304[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'm'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'"'[0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m305[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'c'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m306[0m[39m:        int ch = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m307[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ch, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m308[0m[39m:        n++;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m309[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m's'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m310[0m[39m:        char *p = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, char *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m311[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = p == NULL ? [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m : [0m[1;35mstrlen[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m312[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; !minus && pr < w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m313[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m314[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, p, pr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; minus && pr < w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m329[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'%'[0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m330[0m[39m:        n++;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m331[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m332[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'%'[0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m333[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m334[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m335[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m336[0m[39m:      i++;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m337[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m338[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, n++, i++;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m339[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m340[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m341[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m342[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root‐Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow stems from the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch in mg_vxprintf, which declares a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtiny `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and then calls `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, both [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof which can emit more than [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes, leading to writes past the end of `tmp`.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The last patch introduced a `scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m128[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` buffer but did not entirely remove [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor replace the small [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte buffer; the stack frame still contained a small [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mobject [0m[1;39m([0m[39mreported as `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so the sanitizer continued to report an overflow at [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Core Fix Strategy[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Allocate one shared, sufficiently large buffer at the top of mg_vxprintf[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Immediately after `size_t i = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;`, insert[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          `char scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m128[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - This buffer will be used exclusively for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting, eliminating [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39many small temporaries in that code path.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Remove the small `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` entirely[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Delete the `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` declaration in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Ensure no other code in that branch refers to `tmp`.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Change all mantissa and exponent formatting in `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` to use `scratch`[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Replace:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        with:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Mantissa: format into scratch *[0m[35m/[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, scratch, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Exponent marker *[0m[35m/[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          n++;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Clamp exponent to avoid runaway digit count *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            size_t cap = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent >  [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mcap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m           exponent =  [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mcap;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < -[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mcap - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m exponent = -[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mcap - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Exponent: reuse scratch *[0m[35m/[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, scratch, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   D. Leave all other branches of `mg_vxprintf` unchanged[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - The generic numeric branch already uses `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` with matching [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls, which is large enough for common widths.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Other specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%d`, `%u`, `%x`, `%g`, `%f`, `%s`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remain [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muntouched.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By removing the small `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` buffer and consolidating `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto one `scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m128[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, we eliminate any stack‐allocated objects too small for the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mworst‐case formatted output.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Clamping the return length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`k`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` to [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscratch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` plus explicit null‐termination ensures `scpy` never reads or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrites past the buffer boundary.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This approach does not alter fuzz harnesses, test code, or any other [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting logic, preserving existing functionality and test coverage.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar patterns already exist in the `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch using `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,…[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, validating the use of a larger, caller‐provided [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer for float formatting.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Potential Side‐Effects and Mitigation[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Slightly increased stack usage due to `scratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m128[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, but well within safe [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlimits for typical thread stacks.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No change to performance characteristics of non‐`%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formats.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If future callers request extremely large precision values for `%e`, the clamp[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevents runaway lengths but will silently truncate output; this matches existing [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior in other branches, which do not guard against pathological precisions.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Implementation Steps[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Open `src/fmt.c`.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - At line [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mimmediately after `size_t i = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, add `char [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscratch[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m128[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m317[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Remove the `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` declaration.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Replace the four calls [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtwo `mg_dtoa`+`scpy` and two `mg_lld`+`scpy`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe combined logic that uses `scratch`, clamps `k`, null‐terminates, and outputs as[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshown above.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Leave the rest of `mg_vxprintf` and all other files untouched.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild and rerun fuzzing; verify no further AddressSanitizer [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack‐buffer‐overflow reports in `mg_vxprintf`.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
